selected_quotes: How the legacy of of slavery affects the mental health of Black Americans today
Google, Lingering affects of Slavery. It's a subject the white race ignores.
Read this and go watch I Am Not Your Negro, or vice versa. Just do it
There's something called Post traumatic slave syndrome 😂😂 😐
Aka we as Blacks need to understand and accept the position we're in and finally take action

citation.abstract: Forgiveness, as we have seen in the aftermath of the Charleston killings, is a hallmark of the Black Church. But what psychic toll do these acts of forgiveness exact?
citation.title: How the legacy of slavery affects the mental health of black Americans today
